dcterms:creator: S. Al-Nasrawi
C. Adams
Ali El-Zaart
dcterms:description: This dataset includes a comprehensive analysis of approximately 120 definitions of smart cities, proposing a new definition based on the integration of ICT and other means to improve quality of life and urban efficiency.
dcterms:title: Smart City Definitions

dcterms:creator: M. Afaq Ali
V. K. Panchal
dcterms:description: This dataset analyzes over 100 definitions of smart cities and proposes a futuristic definition based on learning from experience and resource optimization.
dcterms:title: Smart City Definitions

dcterms:creator: J. S. Gracias
G. S. Parnell
E. Specking
E. A. Pohl
R. Buchanan
dcterms:description: This dataset provides a structured literature review of smart cities, analyzing 36 different definitions and proposing a new definition based on the integration of various domains.
dcterms:title: Smart City Definitions
